#summary common OSMan objects interface.
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Summary =

*ISManAll* supported by almost all OSMan objects by default. It used to retrieve object type and instance information.

= Interface =

  * *toString()* <br> Returns string representation of object instance. By default returns *!ModuleName.ClassName.InstanceAddress*. <br>*Example:*
{{{
var man=WScript.CreateObject("OSMan.Application");
echo("App="+man.toString());
}}}
Should print:
{{{
App=OSMan.Application.01718030
}}}
  * *getClassName()* <br> Returns [class_name short class name] (type) of object instance. *getClassName()* is only way to get object typeinfo used in OSMan. This method used in multitype methods like *IMap.putObject(obj)* to distinguish between different object types like *Node*, *Way* and *Relation*.

= Usage =
See *modlist.js* script in examples, *TAbstractMap.putObject* implementation in *uMap.pas* in OSman sources.
